publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3478 Robin Harper: Congratulations to Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltdâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd for winning the Shell Springboard North Region awards panel this year; notes that Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures won the award for its inspirational project entitled Biodiesel - building a small-scale algae bioreactor, which is an innovative system of capturing CO2 emissions to grow algae and then use that algae to produce biodiesel and fertiliser; further congratulates all companies shortlisted in the north region final, including Sustainberry CIC, Kyle Electronic Design Ltd, Ocean Flow Energy Ltd, DRD Power Ltd and Shetland Composites, and wishes Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd all the very best in the UK final, to be judged on 3 March 2009.
S3M-3478 Congratulations to Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd (lodged on 19 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3478 Congratulations to Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd (lodged on 19 February 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3478 Congratulations to Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd (lodged on 19 February 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3478 Congratulations to Scottish Bioenergy Cooperative Ventures Ltd (lodged on 19 February 2009) John Scott*
